entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:56 p.m. PDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 7.5Â°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to periods of snow after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
